release.description: JDO Vendor Profiles and Eclipse 3.0M8 Support
release.action: Eclipse3.0M8 Support added
New Preference Page to support multiple JDO Vendor Profiles
New JDO Metadata file GUI based editor added
Only Triactive JDO Extensions are supported in this version
Not installable at eclipse2.1.x (backport needed)
Eclipse3.0M6 Support added
Action implements interface javax.jdo.spi.PersistenceCapable optimized
Bugfixing to support multiple classes in a JDO metafile
Eclipse3.0M5 Support added
Extract vendor specific parts into separate features (optional installable).
New source editor for jdo meta data files (*.jdo).
Add support of jdo vendor Triactive JDO.
Call of Triactive Enhancer (Sun Wrapper) via context menu now supported.
Bugfixing for page handling of jdo creation wizzard.

release.description: JDO Spec 1.0.1 and Project Nature Support
release.action: First cvs branch for later bug fixes.
Assignment of JDO nature to java projects realized.
Bugfix for preference page support.
Changes within class enhancer related to jdo specification 1.0.1.
First attempt to implemnt a close framework for JDO project developers. Contains preference page and automatic implemts the javax.jdo.spi.PersistenceCapable interface.
experimental works.

experimental works.
experimental works.
experimental works.
Setting up the initial project structure.
